verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* stricken \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* clothes, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* gat \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w heat|strong="H3179"\w*.

Wherefore \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* said \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w cherish|strong="H2436"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H1245"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w get|strong="H1245"\w* \w heat|strong="H2552"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4672"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w cherished|strong="H5532"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* Adonijah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w exalted|strong="H4984"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w*, saying, \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w displeased|strong="H6087"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* saying, \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* hast \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w*? \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* Absalom.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1697"\w* \w conferred|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1697"\w* following Adonijah \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rei|strong="H7472"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w which|strong="H5030"\w* \w belonged|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Adonijah.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Adonijah \w slew|strong="H2076"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stone \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zoheleth|strong="H2120"\w*, \w which|strong="H3063"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w beside|strong="H5973"\w* \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brethren \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*:

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H5030"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w and|strong="H5030"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H5030"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* spake \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mother \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, saying, \w Hast|strong="H3045"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* Adonijah \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w doth|strong="H1732"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* lord \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w give|strong="H3289"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* mayest \w save|strong="H4422"\w* thine \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* say \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, Didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* lord, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* thine handmaid, saying, \w Assuredly|strong="H3588"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H4428"\w* \w doth|strong="H4428"\w* Adonijah \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w talkest|strong="H1696"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w also|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H4390"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H2009"\w* \w thee|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w confirm|strong="H4390"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* into \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w obeisance|strong="H7812"\w* \w unto|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* wouldest \w thou|strong="H4100"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* \w swarest|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thine handmaid, \add saying\add*, \w Assuredly|strong="H3588"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* shah \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, Adonijah \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w hath|strong="H6635"\w* \w slain|strong="H2076"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w hath|strong="H6635"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w thy|strong="H8010"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w hath|strong="H6635"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* shouldest \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

Otherwise \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* lord \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* fathers, \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* counted \w offenders|strong="H2400"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w*, \w lo|strong="H2009"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, saying, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* come \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w himself|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* said, \w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, hast \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* said, Adonijah \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*?
